import React, { useContext, useState, useEffect } from "react"; import { useParams, Link } from "react-router-dom"; import { userContext } from "../../Context/userProvider"; const Detail = () => { const param = useParams(); const { ProductCart: { cart, setCart }, } = useContext(userContext); const { pros: { proState, setProState }, } = useContext(userContext); const [detailProduct, setDetailProduct] = useState([]); useEffect(() => { if (param) { proState.forEach((ele) => { if (ele.id === param.id) setDetailProduct(ele); }); } }, [param, proState]); const [num, setNum] = useState(1); const addToCart = () => { let check = cart.some((item) => { return item.id === param.id; }); let [data] = proState.filter((item) => { return item.id === param.id; }); if (!check) { param.num = num; setCart([...cart, { ...data, num: num }]); } }; const onModifyNum = (n) => { return function () { setNum(num + n); }; }; const onLikeProduct = (e) => { e.currentTarget.classList.toggle("product-mark-liked"); }; return ( <>
